00035 #include "kernel-rfpulse.h"
00036 
00045 void KernelPulse(EXPERIENCE3D * expr, EVENT * event)
00046 {
00047     double w1, w1max, phi, cphi, sphi, x, y, z, dw,edw, alpha, beta, delta, sb, cb, sd, cd;
00048     double antx, anty, antz,oldantx, oldanty, p1, p2, p3, p5, p6, p9;
00049     double r1x, r2x, tau;
00050     double r1y, r2y, r1z, r2z;
00051     int ix, iy, iz, it, n;
00052     int xmin;
00053     int xmax;
00054 
00055 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00056     if (expr->mpi_slice_x0 == -1) {
00057    xmin = 0;
00058    xmax = expr->nfovx;
00059     } else {
00060    xmin=expr->mpi_slice_x0;
00061    xmax=xmin+mpi_get_slice_width(expr, xmin);
00062     }
00063 #else
00064     xmin = 0;
00065     xmax = expr->nfovx;
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 
00069     if (event->pulse_duration && event->ang) {
00070    r1x = G * event->agx;
00071    r2x = expr->xf + expr->obx - event->agxoff;
00072    r1y = G * event->agy;
00073    r2y = expr->yf + expr->oby - event->agyoff;
00074    r1z = G * event->agz;
00075    r2z = expr->zf + expr->obz - event->agzoff;
00076 
00077 
00078    n = 1;
00079    alpha = event->ang;
00080    tau = event->pulse_duration;
00081    w1max = alpha / tau;             // = omega1 max
00082    w1 = w1max;
00083 
00084    for (it = 0; it < n; it++)
00085        for (ix = xmin; ix < xmax; ix++)
00086       for (iy = expr->nfovy - 1; iy >= 0; iy--)
00087        for (iz = expr->nfovz - 1; iz >= 0; iz--) {
00088            antx = expr->magstate[0][ix][iy][iz];   // M_x
00089          anty = expr->magstate[1][ix][iy][iz];   // M_y
00090          antz = expr->magstate[2][ix][iy][iz];   // M_z
00091             oldantx = antx;
00092             oldanty = anty;
00093          x = expr->px * ix - r2x;
00094          y = expr->py * iy - r2y;
00095          z = expr->pz * iz - r2z;
00096 //            dw = (r1x * x) + (r1y * y) + (r1z * z) -expr->G_edw + G_rad_T*expr->G_deche[ix][iy][iz];
00097          if (expr->FLAG_RESONANCE==ON)
00098          { /* pulse angle are considered not affected by resonance frequency shift */
00099            dw = G_rad_T*(event->agx*x + event->agy*y + event->agz*z);
00100          }
00101          else
00102          { /* pulse angle are affected by resonance frequency shift */
00103            edw = expr->G_edw *(expr->B0+ event->agx*x + event->agy*y + event->agz*z + expr->G_deche[ix][iy][iz]);
00104            dw = G_rad_T*(event->agx*x + event->agy*y + event->agz*z + expr->G_deche[ix][iy][iz]) - edw;
00105          }
00106          // Introduction of precomputed B1 inhomogeneities due to high B0-field : B1 module has been normalized (max. is 1)       
00107             if (expr->inhomogeneousB1){
00108            w1 = w1max * IdModule(expr->B1t[iz][iy][ix]);                        
00109               phi = IdPhase(expr->B1t[iz][iy][ix]);
00110           }
00111          beta = -atan2(dw, w1);                   // angle between B1 and Beff (eq.(13) of ref. JMR SIMRI paper)
00112          delta = -tau * sqrt(dw * dw + w1 * w1);  // flip angle alpha' in eq.(12) of ref. paper above
00113          sb = sin(beta);
00114          cb = cos(beta);
00115          sd = sin(delta);
00116          cd = cos(delta);
00117          p5 = cd--; /* p5=cd, cd = cd-1 */
00118          p1 = 1 + sb * sb * cd;
00119          p2 = sb * sd;
00120          p3 = cb * sb * cd;
00121          p6 = -cb * sd;
00122          p9 = 1 + cb * cb * cd;
00123          antx = p1 * oldantx + p2 * oldanty + p3 * antz;
00124          anty = -p2 * oldantx + p5 * oldanty + p6 * antz;
00125            antz = p3 * oldantx - p6 * oldanty + p9 * antz;
00126             expr->magstate[0][ix][iy][iz] = antx;
00127             expr->magstate[1][ix][iy][iz] = anty;
00128          expr->magstate[2][ix][iy][iz] = antz;
00129             }
00130    /* T2* effect management*/
00131    expr->to = expr->to + tau;
00132    if (alpha > M_PI/2) expr->to = expr->to * -1;
00133     }
00134 }
